Submodules¶

polymorph.interceptor module¶

class polymorph.interceptor.Interceptor(template, iptables_rule='iptables -A INPUT -j NFQUEUE --queue-num 1', ip6tables_rule='ip6tables -A INPUT -j NFQUEUE --queue-num 1')[source]¶

Bases: object

This is the class responsible for intercepting packages in rela time, interpreting these packets, interpreting the preconditions, executions and post-conditions of the template and forwarding the modified package to the target machine.

clean_iptables()[source]¶
intercept()[source]¶

This method intercepts the packets and send them to a callback function.

linux_modify(packet)[source]¶

This is the callback method that will be called when a packet is intercepted. It is responsible of executing the preconditions, executions and postconditions of the Template.

packet : Packet
Netfilterqueue packet object. The packet that is intercepted.
set_iptables_rules()[source]¶
windows_modify(packet, w, pydivert)[source]¶

This is the callback method that will be called when a packet is intercepted. It is responsible of executing the preconditions, executions and postconditions of the Template.

packet : Packet
Netfilterqueue packet object. The packet that is intercepted.
w : pointer
windiver pointer.

polymorph.packet module¶

class polymorph.packet.Packet(template)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class encapsulates the packets intercepted by nfqueue in such a way that they are easily accessible by the users.

raw¶

bytes: Packet bytes.

class polymorph.packet.PacketLayer(tlayer)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class encapsulates de Template layers, so the user can access the content of the intercepted packet in an easy an intuitive way.

slice¶

addlayer(layer)[source]¶

Adds a TLayer to the actual Template.

If a TLayer with the same name is already in the Template, we append a random 3 digit number to the name.

layer : Tlayer
Layer that will be added to the Template.

bytes Returns the value encoded in bytes of the TField.

The setter will instantiate a Value class.

valuehex¶

str: Returns the value encoded in hexadecimal of the TField.

The setter will instantiate a Value class.

polymorph.tgenerator module¶

class polymorph.tgenerator.TGenerator(pcapfile, scapy_pkts=None, tshark_pkts=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class is responsible for generating the templates from scapy packages and completing the remaining layers with the dissectors of tshark through pyshark.

tgenerate(scapy_pkt, tshark_pkt, name)[source]¶

Generates a template from a scapy and tshark packet.

scapy_pkt : :obj:``
The packet generated by Scapy.
tshark_pkt : :obj:``
The packet generated by Pyshark.
name : str
The name of the Template.
Obj:Template The Tempalate generated from the packets.

polymorph.tlayer module¶

class polymorph.tlayer.TLayer(name, lslice, raw, fields=None, custom=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class that represents a layer within a Template.

add_struct(fname, fdeps, start_byte, expression)[source]¶

This function creates a structure that relates a field to other fields of the layer, so that its value can be calculated dynamically at run time. Perform additional processing before sending the data to create_struct.

fname: str
Name of the field which value will be recalculated.
fdeps: list of str
Dependen fields.
start_byte: str
Byte in which the value of the main field begins. Must be a str. Fields must be preceded by ‘this’. It can be a complex expression: ‘70 - this.field_len’
expression: str
Expression with which the new field value will be calculated dynamically. Fields must be preceded by ‘this’. Can be complex: ‘this.field_len - this.field2_len - 2’
addfield(field)[source]¶

Adds a TField to the actual TLayer.

If a TField with the same name is alreadry in the TLayer, we append a random 3 digit number to the name.

field : TField
Field that will be added to the TLayer.
create_struct(tfield, fdeps, start_byte, expression)[source]¶
This function creates a structure that relates a field to other
fields of the layer, so that its value can be calculated dynamically
at run time.
tfield : TField
Field for which the new value will be calculated.
fdeps: list of TField
List of fields on which the previous field depends.
start_byte: str
Byte in which the value of the main field begins. Must be a str. Fields must be preceded by ‘this’. It can be a complex expression: ‘70 - this.field_len’
expression: str
Expression with which the new field value will be calculated dynamically. Fields must be preceded by ‘this’. Can be complex: ‘this.field_len - this.field2_len - 2’
Struct
Structure that allows to parse the raw bytes of the packet and
return the exact value of the field.

polymorph.tlist module¶

class polymorph.tlist.TList(tgen, length, names)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class provides a container to store a set of templates, with some methods that facilitate access to them.

show()[source]¶

Show a list of the templates in the TList.

write(path='../templates')[source]¶

Writes TemplateList to disk.

Because the templates are generated in execution time when they are accessed, if the user has already accessed some, they are not generated again, and they are generated from that point.

path : str
The path where the Template will be written.

polymorph.utils module¶

polymorph.utils.capture(userfilter='', pcapname='.tmp.pcap', func=None, count=0, time=None)[source]¶

This function is a wrapper function above the sniff scapy function. The result is a list of templates. The specification on filtering options can be found at: https://goo.gl/kVAmHQ

userfilter : str
Filters to capture packets.
pcapname : str
Path where the pcap will be written.
func : function
Function to be called when a packet arrive, the packet will be passed as parameter.
count : int
Number of packets to capture.
time : int
Stop sniffing after a given time.
TList
List of templates
